about_the_game:
SURVIVE & FIGHT

Fight for survival: take down bosses, exterminate zombies, fend off other survivors, but remember... Death takes away everything.

EXPLORE & BUILD

Explore the interactive world and join player factions by day, while building your outpost or participating in raids by night.

CRAFT & LEVEL UP

Intuitively crafting where recipes are gradually unlocked after gathering new resources and components.

KEY FEATURES:

  • Public servers for up to 200 people simultaneously with low latency and a high tickrate.
  • Intuitively understandable craft where recipes are gradually unlocked after gathering new resources and components.
  • A simple yet versatile construction system with the option for further improvement. Build your base and prepare it for attacks.
  • Regions with increased radiation.
  • A skill leveling system that depends on your actions.
  • Gestures and pose animations.
  • ...and much more.

content_descriptors.notes:
One way to quench your thirst is beer.
One way to relieve pain is morphine.
You have to kill a lot of zombies. Zombies are not alive, they are dead. And you'll be dead if you don't shoot well.

About the Game

Fight for survival: take down bosses, exterminate zombies, fend off other survivors, but remember... Death takes away everything.

name: Ways

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: 2.9 GHz i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Survive in a procedurally generated PvPvE world with friends in first-person. Complete quests, craft weapons, build bases, and wreak havoc on enemies.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Czech, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Greek
*languages with full audio support
